titlestmt.subtitle: An inventory of its Records at Syracuse University
titlestmt.author: PRB

did.head: Overview of the Collection
did.abstract: Records of the international presentation skills training company founded by American playwright and director Ben Shaktman. Correspondence subject files; publications; memorabilia, including photographs and appointment calendars; and media, including audiotapes, VHS tapes, and computer floppy disks.
did.langmaterial: Majority in English, a few items in Chinese, Dutch and French.

bioghist.head: Biographical History
bioghist.p: Founded in 1983 by American playwright and director Ben Shaktman, Shaktman Associates is an international presentation skills training company based in Santa Monica, CA. The company conducts workshops, coaches executives and publishes training material for a wide range of corporate clients.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents of the Collection
scopecontent.p:
The
Shaktman Associates Records spans the years 1983-2008 and is divided into four groups: Correspondence-subject files, Publications, Media, and Memorabilia.
Correspondence-subject files is arranged alphabetically and includes letters to and from and information about Shaktman Associates' clients as well as general correspondence.
Media includes audio, video, and computer material produced by Shaktman Associates as well as its clients and partners.
Memorabilia contains appointment calendars, phone logs, photgraphs, and a diary from Ben Shaktman's trip to China in 2000.
Publications includes workshop materials and handouts as well as general Shaktman Associates brochures and advertising material.

arrangement.head: Arrangement of the Collection
arrangement.p: Material is arranged alphabetically by type or title.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p:
See also the
Ben Shaktman Papers

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: The majority of our archival and manuscript collections are housed offsite and require advanced notice for retrieval. Researchers are encouraged to contact us in advance concerning the collection material they wish to access for their research.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Written permission must be obtained from SCRC and all relevant rights holders before publishing quotations, excerpts or images from any materials in this collection.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Preferred citation for this material is as follows:

did.unittitle: 1) Don't hang Up 2) We're Not Kidding
AS/400 Advanced Series: That's The Beauty Of It
New York times Magazine Quality Gets Results (short version)
Changing The Rules: The Jacksonville Story
Web Site Business Alignment: Attaining Measurable Value
Ben Shaktman coaching an executive presentation
Ben's Dynamics notes re: Credit Union/ Les Speech
Measures of Success in American Business today
